request.description:
Initialize the cluster secrets and operators.

**Authorization**

Accepts:

*   basic auth
*   bearer token from admins
    

**Responses**

***201*** - The cluster was successfully initialized

***400*** - Something went wrong during initializing the operators or creating the git repo because the parameters were not correct

***403*** - You are not authorized

request.description:
Get all cluster names.

**Authorization**

Accepts:

*   admin auth
    

**Responses**

***200*** - You are authorized and get all cluster names

***400*** - The params are not valid

***403*** - You are not authorized

**Parameters**

***search*** - string (*header*): search string that should be in cluster name

***pageIdx*** - number (*header*): page index when the clusters should be paged. it will return 4 cluster per page

response.name: You are authorized and get all cluster names
